title: Zawiyah
description: Zāwiyah (also Zawiyeh) is a site in the middle Euphrates region in what was part of the ancient kingdom of Suhu. The city was situated on the north bank of the Euphrates, a few kilometers west of Sur Jureh and Gleieh. Like many towns and cities of the ancient kingdom of Suhu, Zāwiyah is now underwater; the area was flooded after the construction of the Haditha dam. The city's ancient name is not known.

properties.description: Estimated, representative coordinates based on location of Zawiyah shown in Map 2 of Iraq 45 (1981-82) and on Corona satellite imagery (1102-1025Fore [Dec 11, 1967]).
properties.title: Imagery location of Zawiyah
